jkeesmaat.name: Jennifer Keesmaat
jkeesmaat.title: Chief Planner of the City of Toronto in Canada
jkeesmaat.biography: A former urban design consultant, Jennifer has worked on master plans in Toronto, Vancouver, Mississauga, Vaughan, Regina, Saskatoon, Lethbridge, Moncton, London and Halifax.

awoolger.name: Anne Woolger
awoolger.title: Director of Matthew House Refugee Shelter
awoolger.biography: Anne has been helping resettle refugees for more than 25 years, and started the Toronto-based Matthew House refugee centre in 1998 to help better accomplish this.

mgroleau.name: Mark Groleau
mgroleau.title: Creator of the WikiGod podcast
mgroleau.biography: Mark is an ordained minister and the person behind the Toronto-based WikiGod podcast, which engages with God-thinkers of many stripes to "wiki" God together as a community. He also loves Cantonese chow mein.

smosteller.name: Sue Mosteller
smosteller.title: Sister of St. Joseph
smosteller.biography: Sue is a Toronto-based author, and member of the Sisters of St. Joseph. She is also a trustee of the Henri Nouwen Legacy, and a former leader in the L'Arche and Daybreak Communities.
